title: Toxic Tarot, Twisted Romance: A Flash Fiction of Unrequited Love, Intrigue and the Paranormal Based on Real Events
description: Based on true events. A chance encounter reunites Gerry and Kate, but fortune is not on their side. For the sake of her ailing father, Kate asks Gerry to use his "gifts" to see into the future. Blinded by love, Gerry indulges her. Nothing could have prepared them for what he foresaw. Shorter than the traditional short story, this flash fiction is the ideal length for readers who want to start and finish a story in one sitting. Try this and other flash fiction works by E. Viona for more flash reading entertainment.
author: E. Viona
